Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. loade the URL
2. look to the bottom right of your screen and your task bar
3. access the menu at the top left of the screen and choose move
4. use your arrow keys to move the window onto your wallpaper
5. give the window the focus by clicking on it
6. click on the first tab
